page.title: 02Pebworth Village Hall
page.content: Pebworth's Clubs meet in the village hall which was built in l954. A larger kitchen was added in l977. It is a charity run by an annually elected committee of 8 independant members and representatives from clubs, school, church and parish council. Money for maintenance is raised from fetes, events and a village 'l00' Club. 30 W.I. members meet lst Wednesday each month, l2 of Playgroup's under 5's meet 2 mornings weekly and l3 Brownies (7 - ll years) meet weekly during term time. Senior Club meets one afternoon per month, Mothers and Toddlers one morning a month and badminton is played weekly in winter. The hall is used for private functions, dances, discos and stage productions. It has just been redecorated and new heaters and curtains have been bought.
